alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 29 at 8:41AM MST until November 29 at 9:15AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... North central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 915 AM MST. * At 840 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Rocky Ford to 20 miles east of Walsenburg to near Farisita, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This snow squall will be near... Walsenburg around 855 AM MST. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
